Sequence Information.Peptide Name: SRTAP-40 (natural AMPs; sheep, ruminant, mammals; animals)

Literature.Author: Chen C, Ku C, Bo X, Wang X.2014
Literature.Title: Purification and characterization of a novel antimicrobial peptide from sheep reproductive tract.

Sequence Information.Comments: APD analysis showed 32.5% sequence similary tocPcAMP1/26. Mol. Wt, 4911.741; Mol formula, C230H355N55O61S1; GRAVY, -0.27; Wimley-White whole-residue hydrophobicity, 8.2 kcal/mol.Activity: Active against E. coli ATCC25922 (MIC 12 ug/ml), S. aureus ATCC25923 (MIC 12 ug/ml), Streptococcus sp. ATCC55121 (MIC 24 ug/ml) and C. albicans ATCC2002 (MIC 6 ug/ml). These are MIC50. Reg. 9/2014; SEQ updated 8/2017. GW.
